授業目的: The purpose of this course is to prepare students to work successfully in multi national businesses.
到達目標:
Through this course students will gain an understanding of:
1. Key management principles for success in international business
2. The complexities of managing a business across cultures and countries
3. How to communicate effectively in an international organization
特記事項: 【合併】Advanced Topics in Business G【企業経営戦略特論L】（経営戦略研究科）/企業経営戦略特論L（経営戦略研究科）
授業方法:
"Face to Face format". However, depending on the infection situation of COVID-19, there's a possibility of changing to "Online Format: Simultaneous and Two-Way" via Zoom.
The course will include lectures, group discussions and student presentations.

第12回: Case Study: Japanese vs Foreign Companies
トピック.授業外学習2: Reading 6 case studies and preparation for 1 student group presentation
